summary: RE VARIOUS DEFECTS ON 2000 CHEVROLET CAMARO.   *BF  WHEN THE CONSUMER'S SON STARTED THE VEHICLE AND TURNED THE WHEEL HE NOTICED THAT THE TOP PART OF THE STEERING WHEEL HAD SEPARATED FROM THE BOTTOM HALF.  THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED UNDER WARRANTY.  THE LOCK ASSEMBLY FELL OUT OF THE DRIVER'S DOOR TWICE.  THE PARK LAMPS AND LENS HAD TO BE REPLACED BECAUSE THEY WERE LEAKING.  THE MIRROR ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE MALFUNCTIONED.  *NM
